message.body: Hey, what do you think about the walk through the gym, walk home, have dinner plan for tomorrow? Any interest?

Sorry. Haven't had a chance to email u back. I like both ideas very much but I can prob only do one b/c I have to take care of the dogs. I could do gym and walk them go walk dogs or walk dragons then dinner.
Let's meet at the gym and just do a little walk-through (no workout yet, I kinda just want to see it), then walk home. You can walk the dogs and then we can meet back up. How's that sound?
Sounds great! Where should we go?
How about St Stephens? What time can you meet at the gym?
Sounds good. Haven't been there in ages.
What time will u work until? 5?
I can work with that! Want to say 5 or 5:30? I can do earlier too if u want.
I'm in the Rec center lobby!
